attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been stated by various people including some MPs, that the Speaker is inept and not up to his job. It is said he has become a stumbling block to essential reform required in this dirty parliament. The Speaker has gone some way to prove the rule of the Peter Principle and now needs to be replaced without delay. Parliament will never escape its smell of corruption and public disgust whilst this Speaker is in office.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
